TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Paridrayan, title = Paridrayan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paridrayan} }

S.FORM: Paridrayan i Pingtung a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Paridrayan. u kasalumaluma' nu Paridrayan sa, 229 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 733 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 718 ku tademaw, pakalatu 98%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 15 ku tademaw, pakalatu 2%. u kasabinacadan, Paiwan 95%, Rukai 1%, Bunun 1%, zumazuma 1%.

Paridrayan i Pingtong a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Paridrayan. o kasalomaloma' no Paridrayan sa, 229 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 733 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 718 ko tademaw, pakalato 98%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 15 ko tademaw, pakalato 2%. o kasabinacadan, Paiwan 95%, Rokai 1%, Bonon 1%, zomazoma 1%.
